/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active lifestyle. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
